body:
Hi German,


Yes, I put them there, so I can modify them. I'm using the 3pm and it 
works fine by using -f option in rcontrib (i.e. working with binary 
matrices?). Now I'd like to work with the matrices outside Radiance. Any 
ideas? Thank you!


Bruno
